This script is used for checking the author who should be involved in the author list

Load the dataset

```{R}
rawdatawithinfo <- read.csv('C:\\Users\\haozh\\Desktop\\LL\\GFBI_data\\raregfdata_with_habit_type_20211208.csv')

head(rawdatawithinfo)


names(rawdatawithinfo)


```


```{R}

habitlist <- rawdatawithinfo$DatasetID

typelist <- rawdatawithinfo$DatasetID_leaftype

```


```{R}
habitlist <- habitlist[!is.na(habitlist)]

habitlist <- unique(habitlist)

typelist <- typelist[!is.na(typelist)]
typelist <- unique(typelist)

```
